text: David Dunn is a fictional character. He first appeared in a 2000 movie called Unbreakable. ==Fictional biography== David Dunn was a football player who quit and became a security guard in Philadelphia. ==Portrayals== David Dunn has been portrayed by Bruce Willis in all three of his appearances. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2000 Category:Superhero movie characters Category:Superheroes Category:Unbreakable (franchise)
title: David Dunn
